about_the_game:
This freight car was designed for large-volume and heavy transport of goods that would not comply with the usable space on normal freight cars. The U group has a wide variety of designs, ranging from the two-axle low-loader to the 36-axle carrying wagon. The Uaai has 4 axles per bogie and is loaded with various goods such as transformers or other large components. With the Uaai low loader flatcar you can transport extraordinary and super heavy freight in Trainz.

Features:

-Uaai low loader flatcar in PBR
- couplers and hoses
- Taillight
- new industry products (pipes, heavy machines, transformers)
- animated brakes

This freight car was designed for large-volume and heavy transport of goods that would not comply with the usable space on normal freight cars. The U group has a wide variety of designs, ranging from the two-axle low-loader to the 36-axle carrying wagon. The Uaai has 4 axles per bogie and is loaded with various goods such as transformers or other large components. With the Uaai low loader flatcar you can transport extraordinary and super heavy freight in Trainz.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
